title: Knowledge about language: genre
creator_credit: Thames Television, Adrienne Jones and Cilla Ware
brief_description: The traditional children’s story of “Little Red Riding Hood” is used here to illustrate the varying genre styles of soap opera, comedy, crime, documentary and horror, with each change in the story revealing the structural, linguistic and visual conventions of the particular genre the story is reflecting at the time.
